name: react-flexible-list
description: It helps you create a responsive layout without any media queries or using any third-party CSS library
author: Moussa Alkaly BADJI

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc --declarationDir dist --emitDeclarationOnly && npx babel ./package --out-dir dist --extensions ".ts,.tsx" --copy-files --presets=@babel/preset-env,@babel/preset-react
